TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MasterPage extends System.Web.UI.UserControl

summary.span: 充当仅由 控件和它们各自的子控件组成的页面的模板和合并容器。

span.span: Acts as a template and merging container for pages that are composed only of controls and their respective child controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 母版页函数作为 ASP.NET Web 应用程序中内容页的模板容器和合并页。A master page functions as a template container and merging page for content pages in your ASP.NET Web application. 母版页提供一种在一组内容页面之间共享结构和内容的便利方法。Master pages provide a convenient way to share structure and content across a set of content pages. 使用内容占位符可以定义要替换为内容页内容的母版页的部分。You use content placeholders to define the sections of the master page to replace with content from the content pages. 使用母版页及其相关的内容页时，只需将所需的 XHTML 文档标记 (如 `html` 、 `head` 和 `body`) 添加到母版页，而不再创建其他 .aspx 文件 (ASP.NET 页) 为独立网页。When you use a master page and its related content pages, you add the required XHTML document tags (such as `html`, `head`, and `body`) only to the master page and no longer create your other .aspx files (ASP.NET pages) as stand-alone Web pages. 内容页定义要插入母版页中占位符的内容。The content pages define the content to insert into the placeholders in the master page. 当在运行时对页面发出 HTTP 请求时，母版页和内容页将合并为与内容页名称相同的单个类。When an HTTP request is made for a page at run time, the master page and content pages are combined into a single class with the same name as the content pages. 生成的已编译的合并类派生自 类。The resulting compiled, merged class derives from the class. 母版页可以包含直接标记和服务器控件以及容器控件。A master page can contain direct markup and server controls, as well as container controls. 放置在控件之外的母版页上的每个元素 都呈现在通过合并母版页和内容页面而产生的所有页面上。Every element that is placed in the master page outside of a control is rendered on all pages that result from merging the master page and content pages. 与母版页相关的每个内容页必须在 `MasterPageFile` 其 [@ page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) 指令的属性中引用母版页。Each content page that is related to the master page must reference the master page in a `MasterPageFile` attribute of its [@ Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ydy4x04a(v=vs.100)) directive. 内容页只能包含 `@ Page` 指令和一个或多个 控件。Content pages can contain only a `@ Page` directive and one or more controls. 所有页面文本、标记和服务器控件都必须放置在 控件内。All of your page text, markup, and server controls must be placed within controls. 通过设置控件的属性，标识控件所关联的母版页的控件 。You identify the control of a master page that a control is associated with by setting the property of the control. 在运行时，所请求的页中每个控件的动态内容 都与母版页合并在相关控件的确切位置 。At run time, the dynamic content from each control in the requested page is merged with the master page in the exact location of the related control. 母版页中的任何其他标记和控件不受影响。Any other markup and controls in the master page are unaffected. 可以在 master 类和内容页上定义事件处理程序。Event handlers can be defined in both the master class and on the content page. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Master 和 Content Pages 中的事件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/dct97kc3(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Events in ASP.NET Master and Content Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/dct97kc3(v=vs.100)). 类与扩展名为 master 的文件相关联。The class is associated with files that have a .master extension. 这些文件在运行时编译为 对象，并缓存在服务器内存中。These files are compiled at run time as objects and are cached in server memory. 母版页通过基类的属性可用于 "内容" 页 。The master page is made available to the content page through the property of the base class. 属性返回母版页的实例; 但是，它被类型化为基类 。The property returns the instance of the master page; however, it is typed as the base class. 若要访问母版页的控件、属性和函数， 可以将属性强制转换为 对象。To access controls, properties, and functions of the master page, the property can be cast to a object. 母版页的类名称是使用 `ClassName` [@ master](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228176(v=vs.100)) 指令的特性定义的。The class name of the master page is defined using the `ClassName` attribute of the [@ Master](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228176(v=vs.100)) directive. > [!NOTE] > 带有 .master 扩展名的文件不能用于浏览器。Files with .master extensions are not served to a browser. 在母版页上有效的指令与在对象上可用的指令相同 。The directives that are valid on a master page are the same as those that are available on a object. 它们可以包括以下属性：They can include the following attributes: - `AutoEventWireup` - `ClassName` - `CodeFile` - `CompilerMode` - `CompilerOptions` - `Debug` - `Description` - `EnableTheming` - `EnableViewState` - `Explicit` - `Inherits` - `Language` - `LinePragmas` - `MasterPageFile` - `Src` - `Strict` - `WarningLevel` 母版页指令不会覆盖各个内容页上的指令。Master page directives do not override the directives on individual content pages. 母版页通常是以声明方式创建的。Master pages are most often created declaratively. 如果要以编程方式创建一个母版页，请直接从类派生 。If you want to create a master page programmatically, derive directly from the class. 除了扩展 类之外，您还必须创建 .master 文件以直观地显示 (UI) 的用户界面，该用户界面与您在源文件中调用的类相关联。In addition to extending the class, you must create the .master file to visually display the user interface (UI) that is associated with the classes that you have invoked in your source file. > [!NOTE] > 通过先创建自己的类创建一个母版页时，必须包含该页使用的类所需的所有命名空间。When you create a master page by creating your own class first, you must include all namespaces that are required for the classes that are used by the page. 有关母版页的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 母版页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wtxbf3hh(v=vs.100))。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/wtxbf3hh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 本部分包含四个代码示例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一个代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建一个母版页。The first code example demonstrates how to create a master page declaratively. - 第二个代码示例表示与在第一个代码示例中创建的母版页关联的内容页。The second code example represents the content page that is associated with the master page that was created in the first code example. - 第三个代码示例演示如何向母版页添加属性。The third code example demonstrates how to add a property to a master page. - 第四个代码示例演示如何使用内容页访问母版页上的公共属性。The fourth code example demonstrates how to use a content page to access a public property on the master page. 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式创建母版页，并使用内容页向其添加一些内容。The following example demonstrates how to create a master page declaratively and to add some content to it using a content page. 第一个网页 `MasterPageSample_1.master` 是名为的母版页。The first Web page is the .master page named `MasterPageSample_1.master`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> MasterPage Example
``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> MasterPage Example
``` 下面的示例表示与相关联的内容页 `MasterPageSample_1.master` 。The following example represents the content page that is associated with `MasterPageSample_1.master`. 它包含一个 控件，并 使用属性标识与内容关联的控件 。It contains a control and identifies the control that the content is associated with by using the property. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPageSample_1cs.master" Title="Content Page"%> Hello, Master Pages! ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPageSample_1vb.master" Title="Content Page"%> Hello, Master Pages! ``` 下面的示例演示如何向母版页添加属性。The following example demonstrates how to add a property to a master page. `ClassName`特性用于命名母版页。The `ClassName` attribute is used to name the master page. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" ClassName="MasterExample" %> MasterPage Example
``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" ClassName="MasterExample" %> MasterPage Example
``` 下面的示例演示如何使用内容页访问 `SiteName` 上一个代码示例中母版页上的公共属性。The following example shows how to use a content page to access the public property `SiteName` on the master page in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPage.master" Title="MasterPage Example" %> Hello, Master Pages! ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPage.master" Title="MasterPage Example" %> Hello, Master Pages! ```

span.span: Adds a control to the dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生母版页类可 使用方法将控件添加到 字典中 。Derived master page classes can add controls to the dictionary using the method. 派生类型通常不重写 方法。Derived types do not typically override the method.

exception.span: 在 字典中已经存在具有相同名称的 控件。

span.span: A control with the same name already exists in the dictionary.

span.span: Gets a list of controls that the master page uses to define different content regions.

span.span: An of controls that the master page uses as placeholders for controls found in content pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的母版页类访问 属性以列出 master 包含的当前控件。Derived master page classes access the property to list the current controls that are contained by the master. 派生类型通常不会重写 属性。Derived types do not typically override the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的母版页类可访问 属性来检索当前 控件，如关联的内容页所定义。Derived master page classes access the property to retrieve the current controls, as defined by associated content pages. 派生类型通常不会重写 属性。Derived types do not typically override the property.

summary.span: 获取嵌套母版页方案中当前母版页的父级母版页。

span.span: Gets the parent master page of the current master in nested master pages scenarios.

value.span: 当前母版页的父级母版页；如果当前母版页没有父级，则为 。

span.span: The master page that is the parent of the current master page; otherwise, , if the current master page has no parent.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 属性是只读的，因为不能在运行时生成母版页层次结构。The property is read-only, because master page hierarchies cannot be built at run time. ## Examples 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建嵌套母版页 `.` 。第二个代码示例演示如何引用在第一个代码示例中创建的母版页。The first code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page`.` The second code example demonstrates how to reference the master page that was created in the first code example. 第三个代码示例演示如何使用内容页来引用在第二个代码示例中创建的母版页。The third code example demonstrates how to use a content page to reference the master page that was created in the second code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建嵌套母版页，并表示名为的父母版页 `ParentMasterPage_1` 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page and represents the parent master page named `ParentMasterPage_1`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用名为的嵌套母版页 `ChildMasterPage_1` ，该母版页引用前面的代码示例中创建的母版页。The following code example demonstrates how to use a nested master page named `ChildMasterPage_1` that references the master page that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1cs.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1vb.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用名为的内容页 `ContentPage` ，该内容页引用 `ChildMasterPage_1` 前面的代码示例中创建的。The following code example demonstrates how to use a content page named `ContentPage` that references the `ChildMasterPage_1` that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1cs.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1vb.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ```

span.span: Nested Master Pages

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MasterPageFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MasterPageFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含当前内容的母版页的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the master page that contains the current content.

value.span: 当前母版页的父级母版页的名称；如果当前母版页没有父级，则为 。

span.span: The name of the master page that is the parent of the current master page; otherwise, , if the current master page has no parent.

remarks.format:
## Examples 本部分包含三个代码示例。This section contains three code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建嵌套母版页 `.` 。第二个代码示例演示如何引用在第一个代码示例中创建的母版页。The first code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page`.` The second code example demonstrates how to reference the master page that was created in the first code example. 第三个代码示例演示如何使用内容页来引用在第二个代码示例中创建的母版页。The third code example demonstrates how to use a content page to reference the master page that was created in the second code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建嵌套母版页，并表示名为的父母版页 `ParentMasterPage_1` 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page and represents the parent master page named `ParentMasterPage_1`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用名为的嵌套母版页 `ChildMasterPage_1` ，该母版页引用前面的代码示例中创建的母版页。The following code example demonstrates how to use a nested master page named `ChildMasterPage_1` that references the master page that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1cs.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1vb.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用名为的内容页 `ContentPage` ，该内容页引用 `ChildMasterPage_1` 前面的代码示例中创建的。The following code example demonstrates how to use a content page named `ContentPage` that references the `ChildMasterPage_1` that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1cs.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1vb.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ```

exception.span: 属性只能在 事件中或之前设置。

span.span: The property can only be set in or before the event.
Nested Master Pages
